Package org.pepstock.charba.client.geo

Class ColorAxis

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.ChartContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.ConfigurationContainer<ExtendedScale>
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.Axis
          • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.CartesianAxis<CartesianLinearTick>
            • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.CartesianLinearAxis
              • org.pepstock.charba.client.geo.ColorAxis
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasBeginAtZeroCallbackHandler, HasMinMaxCallbacksHandler<Double>, IsLinearAxis, IsNumericAxis, IsColorAxis, IsLegendAxis
    public final class ColorAxis
extends CartesianLinearAxis
implements IsColorAxis
    The coloring of the nodes will be done with a special color scale.
    Provides the elements, as colored legend, which can provide the how the values are distributed on map.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      (package private) static class  ColorAxis.ColorAxisRemappedOptionsFactory
      Can create a options mapper in order to re-map the CHART.JS options where needed in order to add additional properties and nodes for GEO charts.
